metadata.name: Psexec Execution
metadata.comment: Detects user accept agreement execution in psexec commandline

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\psexec.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('psexec.c'))

output.summary: Detects user accept agreement execution in psexec commandline
